item.title: Alicia add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Louise Rennison
item.description: "Everyone is so obsessed with themselves nowadays that they have no time for me." -- Louise Rennison

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Thinking very often resembles napping, but the intent is different. --Stephanie Plum" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Alicia add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Alicia add a quote by jen lancaster
item.description: "I can't believe anyone would voluntarily run 26 miles. Sometimes I sit on the couch cross-legged because I don't feel like walking to the bathroom." -- jen lancaster

item.title: Alicia add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Beth Hoffman
item.description: "That's what friends should do. cherish the good and pretend not to notice the harmless rest." -- Beth Hoffman

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Sarah Pekkanen
item.description: "You know the definition of a dysfunctional family, don't you? It's any family with more than one member in it." -- Sarah Pekkanen

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Every book, every volume you see here, has a soul. The soul of the person who wrote it and of those who read it and lived and dreamed with it. Every time a book changes hands, every time someone runs his eyes down its pages, its spirit grows and strengthens." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Alicia add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Real love amounts to withholding the truth, even when you're offered the perfect opportunity to hurt someone's feelings" -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alicia add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "All of us take pride and pleasure in the fact that we are unique, but I'm afraid that when all is said and done the police are right: it all comes down to fingerprints." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Christina Baker Kline
item.description: "I've come to think that's what heaven is- a place in the memory of others where our best selves live on." -- Christina Baker Kline

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Elizabeth Strout
item.description: "He looked at the books, and she wanted to say, 'Stop that,' as though he were reading her diary." -- Elizabeth Strout

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Elizabeth Strout
item.description: "Oh, gosh, Olive. I'm so embarrassed." "No need to be," Olive tells her. "We all want to kill someone at some point." (179)" -- Elizabeth Strout

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Jen Lancaster
item.description: "Fletch then kisses me on the forehead before opening the cabinet under the coffeemaker to grab placemats and napkins. Retrieving these items is his job because I kind of don't like to bend. I also refuse to carry anything heavier than my purse." -- Jen Lancaster

item.title: Alicia add a quote by Mark Zusak
item.description: "Her hand was sore by page three. Words are so heavy, she thought...." -- Mark Zusak
